DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect carbohydrate intake training efficacy health parameter endurance train program healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Influencing Factors Training Efficacy Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Carbohydrate availability endurance exercise seem attenuate exercise-induced perturbation cellular homeostasis consequently diminish stimulus train adaptation . Therefore , negative relationship exercise efficacy seem plausible . However , experimental evidence rare far conclusive . Therefore , present study aim test influence carbohydrate intake efficacy typical preventive training program .
DOC.criteria: disease nonsmoker BMI 2530 kg/m² blood pressure < 160/100 mm/Hg unmedicated untrained status V̇O2max < 50 mL/kg/min
